title: Google Veo 2 vs Google Document AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Google Veo 2 vs Google Document AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Google Veo 2 and Google Document AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Google Veo 2 vs Google Document AI
paragraphs: Google Veo 2 (video generation) is Google Veo 2 is a state-of-the-art generative AI model designed to create high-quality, realistic videos from text, image, or video prompts. It excels at producing 1080p resolution videos with fine-grained control over cinematic styles, advanced physics simulation, and temporal consistency for coherent motion. Primarily targeting professional creators and filmmakers, it distinguishes itself through deep integration with Google's ecosystem and research in scalable video generation.. It's known for video-generation, generative-ai, google-deepmind.

Google Document AI (nlp) is Google Document AI is a cloud-based platform that uses machine learning to automatically parse, classify, and extract structured data from scanned and digital documents. It targets businesses and developers looking to automate document-intensive workflows, offering pre-trained models for common document types and the ability to build custom processors. Its key differentiator is deep integration with the Google Cloud ecosystem and its use of Google's foundational AI research to deliver high-accuracy extraction with minimal configuration.. Users choose it for document-processing, intelligent-document-processing, optical-character-recognition.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Google Veo 2: Generates 1080p resolution videos up to 60 seconds long from text prompts, Accepts image or video prompts for style and composition control, Advanced physics simulation for realistic motion and object interaction

Google Document AI: Pre-trained processors for invoices, receipts, ID documents, contracts, and utility bills, Custom processor training for unique document layouts and data fields, Advanced OCR with handwriting recognition and layout preservation

verdict: Both Google Veo 2 and Google Document AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Google Veo 2 for video-generation, Google Document AI for document-processing.
